maqras.text: Ata 'Amru Allahi Fala Tasta`jiluhu Subhanahu Wa Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Yunazzilu Al-Mala'ikata Bir-Ruhi Min 'Amrihi `Ala Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi 'An 'Andhiru 'Annahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa 'Ana Fa Attaquni
Khalaqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđa Bil-Haqqi Ta`ala `Amma Yushrikuna
Khalaqa Al-'Insana Min Nutfatin Fa'idha Huwa Khasimun Mubinun
Wa Al-'An`ama Khalaqaha Lakum Fiha Dif'un Wa Manafi`u Wa Minha Ta'kuluna
Wa Lakum Fiha Jamalun Hina Turihuna Wa Hina Tasrahuna
Wa Tahmilu 'Athqalakum 'Ila Baladin Lam Takunu Balighihi 'Illa Bishiqqi Al-'Anfusi 'Inna Rabbakum Lara'ufun Rahimun
Wa Al-Khayla Wa Al-Bighala Wa Al-Hamira Litarkabuha Wa Zinatan Wa Yakhluqu Ma La Ta`lamuna
Wa `Ala Allahi Qasdu As-Sabili Wa Minha Ja'irun Wa Law Sha'a Lahadakum 'Ajma`ina
Huwa Al-Ladhi 'Anzala Mina As-Sama'i Ma'an Lakum Minhu Sharabun Wa Minhu Shajarun Fihi Tusimuna
Yunbitu Lakum Bihi Az-Zar`a Wa Az-Zaytuna Wa An-Nakhila Wa Al-'A`naba Wa Min Kulli Ath-Thamarati 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
Wa Sakhkhara Lakumu Al-Layla Wa An-Nahara Wa Ash-Shamsa Wa Al-Qamara Wa An-Nujumu Musakhkharatun Bi'amrihi 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Wa Ma Dhara'a Lakum Fi Al-'Arđi Mukhtalifaan 'Alwanuhu 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatan Liqawmin Yadhakkaruna
Wa Huwa Al-Ladhi Sakhkhara Al-Bahra Lita'kulu Minhu Lahmaan Tariyaan Wa Tastakhriju Minhu Hilyatan Talbasunaha Wa Tara Al-Fulka Mawakhira Fihi Wa Litabtaghu Min Fađlihi Wa La`allakum Tashkuruna
Wa 'Alqa Fi Al-'Arđi Rawasiya 'An Tamida Bikum Wa 'Anharaan Wa Subulaan Lla`allakum Tahtaduna
Wa `Alamatin Wa Bin-Najmi Hum Yahtaduna
Afaman Yakhluqu Kaman La Yakhluqu 'Afala Tadhakkaruna
Wa 'In Ta`uddu Ni`mata Allahi La Tuhsuha 'Inna Allaha Laghafurun Rahimun
Wa Allahu Ya`lamu Ma Tusirruna Wa Ma Tu`linuna
Wa Al-Ladhina Yad`una Min Duni Allahi La Yakhluquna Shay'aan Wa Hum Yukhlaquna
Amwatun Ghayru 'Ahya'in Wa Ma Yash`uruna 'Ayyana Yub`athuna
Ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Fa-Al-Ladhina La Yu'uminuna Bil-'Akhirati Qulubuhum Munkiratun Wa Hum Mustakbiruna
La Jarama 'Anna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Yusirruna Wa Ma Yu`linuna 'Innahu La Yuhibbu Al-Mustakbirina
Wa 'Idha Qila Lahum Madha 'Anzala Rabbukum Qalu 'Asatiru Al-'Awwalina
Liyahmilu 'Awzarahum Kamilatan Yawma Al-Qiyamati Wa Min 'Awzari Al-Ladhina Yuđillunahum Bighayri `Ilmin 'Ala Sa'a Ma Yaziruna
Qad Makara Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Fa'ata Allahu Bunyanahum Mina Al-Qawa`idi Fakharra `Alayhimu As-Saqfu Min Fawqihim Wa 'Atahumu Al-`Adhabu Min Haythu La Yash`uruna
Thumma Yawma Al-Qiyamati Yukhzihim Wa Yaqulu 'Ayna Shuraka'iya Al-Ladhina Kuntum Tushaqquna Fihim Qala Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-`Ilma 'Inna Al-Khizya Al-Yawma Wa As-Su'a `Ala Al-Kafirina
Al-Ladhina Tatawaffahumu Al-Mala'ikatu Zalimi 'Anfusihim Fa'alqaw As-Salama Ma Kunna Na`malu Min Su'in Bala 'Inna Allaha `Alimun Bima Kuntum Ta`maluna
Fadkhulu 'Abwaba Jahannama Khalidina Fiha Falabi'sa Mathwa Al-Mutakabbirina
